definition: classifier for a ream of paper
to order/to command/an order/warrant/writ/to cause/to make sth happen/virtuous/honorific title/season/government position (old)
to love/to be fond of/to like/affection/to be inclined (to do sth)/to tend to (happen)

sentences.english: Sometimes, the love between lovers will not separate die, but will become deeper.
sentences.chinese: 有時，戀人間的分離不會令愛磨滅，反而會變得更深。

sentences.english: This product smell pleasantly, make your pet enjoy the bathing.
sentences.chinese: 本品香味怡人，令愛寵在沉醉於沐浴的樂趣之中。

definition: lit. to sleep on brushwood and taste gall (like King Gou Jian of Yue 勾踐|勾践[Gou1 Jian4]), in order to recall one's humiliations) (idiom)/fig. to maintain one's resolve for revenge
lit. ten thousand strings of cash in money belt (idiom); carrying lots of money/extremely wealthy/loaded
to regard it as an honor (idiom)
to churn out large quantities without regard for quality (idiom); rough and slipshod work
to make an effort to become strong (idiom); determined to do better/to pull one's socks up
lit. to kill the chicken to get the eggs (idiom)/fig. to kill the goose that lays the golden eggs
